name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
description: Foundational certification demonstrating an overall understanding of the AWS Cloud. Essential for professionals working with cloud technologies.

name: Advanced Machine Learning on Google Cloud
description: Focuses on building and deploying machine learning models at scale using Google Cloud Platform, covering BigQuery, TensorFlow, and AutoML.

name: Machine Learning Engineering for Production (MLOps) Specialization
description: Covers the deployment of machine learning models into production environments, integrating continuous training and model evaluation.

name: Deep Learning Specialization
description: Deep learning fundamentals and techniques including neural networks, convolutional networks, and sequence models.

name: Natural Language Processing Specialization
description: Extensive training in NLP, including text processing, sentiment analysis, and building language models with Transformers and BERT.

name: DeepLearning.AI TensorFlow Developer
description: Certification focusing on TensorFlow application, from basic concepts to complex scenarios in real-world machine learning and AI development.
